If this is the first agenda to advance to 2b, spawn the set-aside Vile Broodmaster enemy at the Shrine of Magh'an Ark'at.
side/wog_encounter.flavor: From each drop of embryonic liquid that rolls off of the egg's surface, horrible creatures gestate: agents of paradise, or so the Cult of Ark'at believes.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Incubation Progresses
side/wog_encounter.text: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced - When this agenda advances: - If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next green agenda. - If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next green agenda.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Incubated by the energies of the hub dimension, the egg of Ark'at has hatched. But its caretakers were wrong. So very, very wrong. There will be no paradise on Earth, for the entity that stirred within Ark'at is no heavenly being, no spirit of justice or righteousness, nothing capable of intelligent thought at all - it is a rampaging monstrosity that knows only hunger, death, and destruction.
side/wog_encounter.back_text: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 [cultist] token to the chaos bag. Flip Hub Dimension to its (Gateway to Destruction) side. If Hub Dimension is not in play, put it into play, (Gateway to Destruction) side faceup. Spawn the set-aside Magh'an Ark'at enemy at Hub Dimension. Search the encounter deck, encounter discard pile, and each play area for all blue and red encounter cards and remove them from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. Remove each agenda and act from the game and put the set-aside The Egg Hatches agenda into play.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Incubation Nears Completion
side/wog_encounter.text: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced - When this agenda advances: - If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the set-aside The Egg Hatches agenda. - If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the set-aside The Egg Hatches agenda.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Black clouds descend on the cities of Earth. But they are not storm clouds. They are the soaring masses of Ezel: swarms of monstrous insects that fill the sky and the streets with incessant buzzing. The droning of the hive is constant. An ever-present reminder of what might come if you fail to stop them.
side/wog_encounter.back_text:
If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 [elder_thing] token to the chaos bag.
Shuffle 3 of the 4 set-aside Trylogog enemies, the 2 Transmogrify treacheries, and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
If this is the first agenda to advance to 1b, spawn the remaining set-aside Trylogog enemy. That enemy gains an additional swarming 2.
side/wog_encounter.flavor: From a pit deep within the crust of the Earth, something horrid begins to emerge...
side/wog_encounter.name: The Proliferation of the Swarm
side/wog_encounter.text: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced - When this agenda advances: - If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next red agenda. - If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next red agenda.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Emerging from within the Burning Pit that joins with the nexus, the Matriarch of Ezel joins the hive. The clouds grow darker and denser as the form of the swarm's master begins to coalesce. Soon, all will be assimilated into the hive.
side/wog_encounter.back_text:
If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 [elder_thing] token to the chaos bag.
If a copy of Trylogog is set-aside, shuffle it into the encounter deck.
If this is the first agenda to advance to 2b, spawn the set-aside Droning Horde enemy at the Burning Pit.
side/wog_encounter.flavor: For the Cult of Assimilation, the appearance of the swarm is the heralding of a new era. A rebirth, of sorts, into a higher form. An ascendance.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Proliferation Progresses
side/wog_encounter.text: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced - When this agenda advances: - If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next red agenda. - If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next red agenda.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: The Burning Pit erupts with insects. They fill every tunnel beneath the city and spill out into the sky, joining with their brethren until the swarm has completely obscured the atmosphere. The droning of the clouds is so loud that it drowns out all other sound, even the din of the chaos that is soon to be unleashed. With the swarm united, the assimilation of Earth has begun.
side/wog_encounter.back_text: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 [elder_thing] token to the chaos bag. Flip Hub Dimension to its (Gateway to Destruction) side. If Hub Dimension is not in play, put it into play, (Gateway to Destruction) side faceup. Spawn the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl enemy at Hub Dimension. Search the encounter deck, encounter discard pile, and each play area for all blue and green encounter cards and remove them from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. Remove each agenda and act from the game and put the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl Emerges agenda into play.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Proliferation Nears Completion
side/wog_encounter.text: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced - When this agenda advances: - If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl Emerges agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl Emerges agenda.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: The astronomer's notes weigh heavily in your weary hands. "Nothing in any science, or any religion for that matter, can explain this phenomenon," the preface reads. The notes then go on to describe a pocket within the void of space itself - a hole inside which another world can be seen. "I know my observations will be dismissed as madness, but I have seen it with my own two eyes. A nexus linking this world with others." Crazy as it all sounds, this discovery connects all of the dots in your investigation. Each of the cultists you've interrogated mentioned some kind of "hub," the opening of which will spell the inevitable end of all things, paradise on Earth, or assimilation into "the hive," depending on whom you are interrogating. The place described by this astronomer must be this "hub." You still do not understand precisely what is going on, but at least now you know what you have to do. If opening this hub is the goal of this war, yours must be to seal the hub so that it may never be opened.
side/wog_encounter.back_text: Put the set-aside Hub Dimension location into play, (Unsealed) side faceup.
side/wog_encounter.flavor: Three zealous cults have emerged from the shadows and their schemes are engulfing Earth in all-out war. You must find out why the cults are fighting and put a stop to their battle.
side/wog_encounter.name: War of the Outer Gods
side/wog_encounter.text: Forced - When any amount of doom is placed on a player card: Place that amount of doom on any agenda as well. Objective - Investigators may only spend the requisite number of clues if no [[Cultist]] enemies are in play.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: You have never in your life performed a rite such as this. It takes all of your strength, all of your resolve, and all of your ingenuity to complete it without faltering. One misspoken incantation, one false ingredient, one wrong step, and the entire endeavor will have been for naught.
side/wog_encounter.back_text:
If you are playing in Single Group Mode:
When your work is done, you and your companions lie on the cold ground, your skin tingling with otherworldly currents. The night sky is filled with stars and no longer blotted out by swirling black entities or alternate dimensions swathed in uncanny mist.
The investigators have sealed Earth away from the cataclysmic war of the Outer Gods. (→R1)
If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode:
This entrance to the hub is sealed, but there are many more entrances that must be sealed before the war can truly end...
Place 2 wards on each agenda. Advance to act 3a.
side/wog_encounter.flavor: Seal off the hub dimension before it is too late!
side/wog_encounter.name: Close the Portal
side/wog_encounter.text: [action] If you are at a [[Ritual Site]]: You try to seal off the portal. Place 1 of your clues around Hub Dimension. Then you may test [willpower] (2) or [intellect] (2). If you succeed, place 1 of your clues around Hub Dimension. Forced - When any amount of doom is placed on a player card: Place that amount of doom on any agenda as well. Objective - If your group has "sealed off the Hub Dimension," advance.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: When your work is done, you and your companions lie on the cold ground, your skin tingling with otherworldly currents. The night sky is filled with stars and no longer blotted out by swirling black entities or alternate dimensions swathed in uncanny mist.
side/wog_encounter.back_text: The investigators have sealed Earth away from the cataclysmic war of the Outer Gods. (→R1)
side/wog_encounter.flavor: Help your companions seal off all the hub dimensions before a cult completes their ritual.
side/wog_encounter.name: Close All Portals
side/wog_encounter.text: [action] If you are at a [[Ritual Site]]: You try to seal off another portal. Test [willpower] (3) or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, place 1 of your clues around another group's Hub Dimension. Forced - When any amount of doom is placed on a player card: Place that amount of doom on any agenda as well. Objective - If each group has "sealed off the Hub Dimension," advance.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor:
"What lay behind our joint love of shadows and marvels was, no doubt, the ancient, mouldering, and sublty fearsome town in which we live - witch-cursed, legend-haunted Arkham, whose huddled, sagging gambrel roofs and crumbling Georgian balustrades brood out the centuries beside the darkly muttering Miskatonic."
-H. P. Lovecraft, "The Thing on the Doorstep"
side/wog_encounter.name: Arkham
side/wog_encounter.text:
Arkham cannot have attachments.
[free] Spend 1 [per_investigator] resources: Move to a connecting location.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor:
"Streets with carved doorways where the sunset beams
Flooded old fanlights and small window-panes,
And Georgian steeples topped with gilded vanes -
These are the sights that shaped my childhood dreams."
-H. P. Lovecraft, "Fungi from Yuggoth"
side/wog_encounter.name: Streets of Providence
side/wog_encounter.text: [action] [action]: Deal 3 damage to a non-[[Ancient One]] enemy at a [[Providence]] location in any group. (Group limit once per game.)

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: The telescopes and astrolabes of the Cult of Silenus manifest their reverence of the night sky. The darkness and emptiness of the vast universe mirror their faith that all life must end.
side/wog_encounter.name: Athenaeum of the Empty Sky
side/wog_encounter.text: [free] Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Place 1 ward on the blue agenda. (Group limit once per round.)

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: As the nation's first indoor mall, the elegant Arcade and its Greek Revival columns and granite walls have been a fixture of Providence since 1828.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Arcade
side/wog_encounter.text: [action]: Test [agility] (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Founded in 1642 as Ville-Marie, or "City of Mary," Montréal has a multitude of architectural styles, such as the Art Deco of the Université of Montréal and the Gothic Revival of the historic Notre-Dame Basilica.
side/wog_encounter.name: Streets of Montréal
side/wog_encounter.text: [action] [action]: Deal 3 damage to a non-[[Ancient One]] enemy at a [[Montréal]] location in any group. (Group limit once per game.)

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Built in 1705 as an illustrious residence, Chateau Ramezay is a museum containing numerous works of art that are a portal to Montréal's past.
side/wog_encounter.name: Chateau Ramezay
side/wog_encounter.text: [action]: Test [willpower] (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue <i>(from the token pool)<i>.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: The followers of Magh'an Ark'at have cradled the insidious egg even as it outgrew the shrine. They believe the hatching of the egg will bring eternal paradise, but its translucency betrays that delusion.
side/wog_encounter.name: Shrine of Magh'an Ark'at
side/wog_encounter.text: [free] Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Place 1 ward on the green agenda. (Group limit once per round.)

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Boosted by the unprecedented prosperity of the Roaring Twenties, New York City is in the midst of a building boom as towers grow ever taller. Skyscrapers are topping one another in rapid succession: the Woolworth Building was surpassed by the Chrysler Building, which will soon be eclipsed by the Empire State Building.
side/wog_encounter.name: Streets of New York City
side/wog_encounter.text: [action] [action]: Deal 3 damage to a non-[[Ancient One]] enemy at a [[New York City]] location in any group. (Group limit once per game.)

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: Deep beneath the bustling streets of New York City lies a decrepit place of worship for the Outer God Ezel-zen-rezl. The fanatical cultists wear enchanted skulls and have but one belief: the only path to eternity is through assimilation.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Burning Pit
side/wog_encounter.text: [free] Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Place 1 ward on the red agenda. (Group limit once per round.)

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: This luxurious top-floor residence is furnished with state-of-the-art amenities and has an exquisite view of the New York City skyline.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Penthouse
side/wog_encounter.text: [action]: Test [combat] (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

side/wog_encounter.back_text: While there are 6 [per_investigator] or more clues around Hub Dimension, your group has "sealed off the Hub Dimension."
side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: A vast network of cosmic tunnels where gravity is warped in a surreal web of astral dimensions.
side/wog_encounter.name: Hub Dimension
side/wog_encounter.text:
Hub Dimension cannot have attachments.
Hub Dimension is connected to each [[Ritual Site]], and vice versa.
[action]: Test [willpower] (2) or [intellect] (2). If you succeed, spend 3 clues or remove 2 clues from around Hub Dimension to deal 2 damage to an [[Ancient One]] enemy (if you succeed by 3 or more, instead deal 3 damage).

side/wog_encounter.flavor: "A swift and painless end is a mercy."
side/wog_encounter.name: Nihilistic Stargazer
side/wog_encounter.text: Aloof. Warring. Spawn - Athenaeum of the Empty Sky. Forced - At the end of the round, if no green or red enemies are in play: Place 1 doom on the blue agenda.

side/wog_encounter.name: Death and Decay
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. - You and each asset you control take 1 direct damage. - Choose an [[Item]] asset you control and remove it from the game.

side/wog_encounter.flavor: "We shall usher in a new paradise!"
side/wog_encounter.name: Zealot of Paradise
side/wog_encounter.text: Aloof. Warring. Spawn - Shrine of Magh'an Ark'at. Forced - At the end of the round, if no blue or red enemies are in play: Place 1 doom on the green agenda.

side/wog_encounter.name: Predator's Call
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - Attach Predator's Call to the nearest green enemy. If that enemy is [[Mutated]], place 1 resource on it, as a mutation. If no green enemies are in play, Predator's Call gains surge. Attached enemy gets +1 fight, +1 evade, +1 damage, and +1 horror.

side/wog_encounter.name: Disciple of the Swarm
side/wog_encounter.text: Aloof. Warring. Spawn - The Burning Pit. Forced - At the end of the round, if no blue or green enemies are in play: Place 1 doom on the red agenda.

side/wog_encounter.name: Feast of Locusts
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). Increase the difficulty of this test by 1 for each swarm card in play. If you fail, take 2 horror (if you fail by 4 or more, instead take 3 horror).

side/wog_encounter.name: Hellfire
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (4). If you fail, either take 2 damage or place 2 of your clues on your location (if you fail and have 4 or more clues, do both instead).

side/wog_encounter.name: Ravages of War
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - Each non-[[Elite]] enemy moves and attacks as if it were the enemy phase. Enemies do not exhaust after attacking in this way. If no attacks were made as a result of this effect, Ravages of War gains surge.

side/wog_encounter.name: While They Sleep
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - For each faction that has the most enemies in play, place 1 doom on that faction's agenda. If no enemies are in play, place no doom and While They Sleep gains surge.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: The temperature plunges until there is no heat left. Absolute darkness displaces all light. Budding life is expunged by the endless void. Your consciousness fades into utter oblivion.
side/wog_encounter.name: Silenus Descends
side/wog_encounter.text: Each blue enemy loses aloof, loses warring, and gains hunter. Objective - If Silenus is defeated, (→R3).

side/wog_encounter.name: Silenus
side/wog_encounter.text: *Silenus has a global health pool of 8[per_investigator]. Hunter. Massive. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Each investigator at Silenus's location must decide (choose one) - - Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. - Remove each card in your hand from the game. - Take 3 horror.

side/wog_encounter.name: The Inescapable Maw
side/wog_encounter.text:
Hunter.
Anytime an investigator is forced to "decide" by an ability on a blue encounter card, they must choose two options instead of one.

side/wog_encounter.name: Hune-Stitched Herald
side/wog_encounter.text: Warring. Forced - After Hune-Stitched Herald engages you: You must decide (choose one) - - Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. - Remove 2 clues from around Hub Dimension. - Hune-Stitched Herald attacks you.

side/wog_encounter.name: Ethereal Entity
side/wog_encounter.text: Warring. Spawn - Athenaeum of the Empty Sky. Forced - After Ethereal Entity engages you: You must decide (choose one) - - Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. - Place 1 of your clues on your location. - Take 2 horror.

side/wog_encounter.name: Inevitable End
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. - Choose 3 cards in your hand and remove them from the game. - Remove the top 6 cards of your deck from the game. Shuffle each weakness removed this way into your deck.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: With each minute that passes, the creature grows larger and larger. Its scales deflect bullet and spell alike. Your only hope was to destroy it while it was still an infant. Chaos erupts around you as it charges. You are nothing but an insect now.
side/wog_encounter.name: The Egg Hatches
side/wog_encounter.text: Each green enemy loses aloof, loses warring, and gains hunter. Objective - If Magh'an Ark'at is defeated, (→R4).

side/wog_encounter.name: Magh'an Ark'at
side/wog_encounter.text: *Magh'an Ark'at has a global health pool of 8[per_investigator]. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Place 1 resource on each [[Mutated]] enemy at Magh'an Ark'at's location, as a mutation. Deal 1 damage to each investigator at this location for each mutation on Magh'an Ark'at.

side/wog_encounter.name: Vile Broodmaster
side/wog_encounter.text: Hunter. Retaliate. Vile Broodmaster gets +1 health for each mutation on it. Forced - When 1 or more mutations would be placed on an enemy: Place 1 additional mutation on that enemy.

side/wog_encounter.name: Horrific Shoggoth
side/wog_encounter.text: Retaliate. Warring. Horrific Shoggoth gets +1 damage for each mutation on it. Forced - When Horrific Shoggoth attacks: Place 1 resource on it, as a mutation.

side/wog_encounter.name: Bringer of Paradise
side/wog_encounter.text: Aloof. Retaliate. Warring. Spawn - Shrine of Magh'an Ark'at. Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 resource on Bringer of Paradise, as a mutation. Then, if there are 3 or more mutations on it, remove 2 of them and place 2 doom on the green agenda.

side/wog_encounter.name: Hunt Down
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - Place 1 resource on the [[Mutated]] enemy with the highest fight, as a mutation. That enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, and engages you. Then, it attacks you. If no [[Mutated]] enemies are in play, Hunt Down gains surge.

side/wog_encounter.back_flavor: The full magnitude of the boundless horde is unleashed upon Earth. You shout in horror and agony as the overwhelming swarm surrounds you. Vulnerable, helpless, and hopeless. Bit by bit, you are devoured, and yet, your consciousness remains.
side/wog_encounter.name: Ezel-zen-rezl Emerges
side/wog_encounter.text: Each red enemy loses aloof, loses warring, and gains hunter. Objective - If Ezel-zen-rezl is defeated, (→R2).

side/wog_encounter.name: Ezel-zen-rezl
side/wog_encounter.text: *Ezel-zen-rezl has a global health pool of 7 [per_investigator]. Hunter. Massive. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Each investigator at Ezel-zen-rezl's location chooses both a card from their hand and an asset they control and places them facedown underneath an [[Insect]] enemy as swarm cards.

side/wog_encounter.name: Droning Horde
side/wog_encounter.text: Hunter. Swarming 6. Forced - After Droning Horde enters play: Each investigator chooses a card from their hand and places it facedown underneath an [[Insect]] enemy as a swarm card. Forced - When Droning Horde attacks: It deals either its damage or its horror, instead of both.

side/wog_encounter.flavor: The irritating, incessant buzzing of the swarm can be heard from miles away.
side/wog_encounter.name: Trylogog
side/wog_encounter.text: Swarming 2. Warring. Spawn - Burning Pit. Forced - When Trylogog attacks: It deals either its damage or its horror, instead of both.

side/wog_encounter.name: Transmogrify
side/wog_encounter.text: Revelation - Place an asset you control facedown underneath an [[Insect]] enemy as a swarm card. If no [[Insect]] is in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Trylogog and spawn it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

side/wog_encounter.name: Cloak of the Outer Realm
side/wog_encounter.text:
Uses (4 charges).
[reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy would engage you, spend 1 charge: Exhaust that enemy instead.

side/wog_encounter.name: Pocket Portal
side/wog_encounter.text: Fast. Forced - After Pocket Portal enters play: Place your investigator mini-card onto Pocket Portal and immediately end your turn. While your mini-card is on Pocket Portal, you are not at any location and enemies cannot spawn engaged with you. At the start of your turn, discard Pocket Portal and move to any revealed location.

side/wog_encounter.name: Dreaded End
side/wog_encounter.text:
Uses (3 charges).
[action] Spend 1 charge: Choose one -
- Place a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location on top of the encounter deck.
- Look at the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Discard 2 of them and return the rest to the top, in any order.

side/wog_encounter.name: Blade of Ark'at
side/wog_encounter.text: [free] Exhaust Blade of Ark'at and spend 1 resource: Place 1 resource on Blade of Ark'at (from the token pool). [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for each resource on Blade of Ark'at. If you succeed, remove up to 3 resources from Blade of Ark'at to deal that much additional damage to the attacked enemy.

side/wog_encounter.name: Enchanted Skull
side/wog_encounter.text:
[free] Exhaust Enchanted Skull: Place the top card of your deck facedown underneath Enchanted Skull.
[free]: You get +1 to this skill test for each card underneath Enchanted Skull. Then discard 1 card from underneath Enchanted Skull, at random. (Limit once per turn.)

side/mtt_encounter.flavor: The high-voltage demonstrations performed by Tesla throughout America and Europe were truly awe-inspiring.
side/mtt_encounter.name: Nikola Tesla
side/mtt_encounter.text: [fast] Exhaust Nikola Tesla: Parley. Test [intellect] (1). If you succeed, either gain 1 clue (from the token pool), draw 2 cards, or gain 3 resources. (Max once per game per option.)

side/mtt_encounter.name: Ezra Graves
side/mtt_encounter.text:
[fast] During any investigator's turn, exhaust Ezra Graves and spend 1 resource: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn.
[action]: Choose an [[Ally]] asset in your discard pile and put it into play under your control (Max once per game.)

side/mtt_encounter.name: Dimensional Beam Machine
side/mtt_encounter.text:
Uses (2 charges).
[fast] During your turn, exhaust Dimensional Beam Machine and spend 1 charge: Move an investigator or a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location to any revealed location.

side/blbe.back_text: Deck Size: 50. Deckbuilding Options: Neutral cards level 0-5, cards from any class level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Ravenous, 3 copies of Regurgitation, 3 copies of Reality Acid, 2 random basic weaknesses. Deckbuilding Restrictions: No permanents except story and signature permanents. Additional Requirements: Your deck must include at least 7 cards from each class ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], and [survivor]). Additional Upgrade Options: After each scenario ends, separate each card you devoured (beneath Ravenous and set-aside) by class. Before the next scenario in this campaign, you may spend experience to purchase or upgrade 1 or more cards of any level from the class with the most devoured cards (if there is a tie, choose one).

deck_options.error: No permanents except story and signature permanents
You must have at least 7 cards from each class

side/blbe.deck_requirements: size:50, card:89002, card:89003, card:89004, random:subtype:basicweakness, random:subtype:basicweakness
side/blbe.name: Subject 5U-21
side/blbe.text: You begin the game with Ravenous (Controlled Hunger) in play. During each upkeep phase, draw 1 additional card and devour anon-weakness player card in your hand. [fast]: Devour a non-story card controlled by an investigator at your location. (Limit once per round.) [elder_sign] effect: +2. After this test ends, you may add a devoured card to its owner's hand.

side/blbe.name: Ravenous
side/blbe.text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent. Each time you devour a card, place it facedown beneath Ravenous. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5). Forced - If there are 5 or more cards beneath Ravenous: Flip it over.

side/blbe.name: Ravenous
side/blbe.text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent. Each time you devour a card, set it aside, out of play. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5). Forced - At the end of your turn: Devour a non-story card beneath Ravenous or controlled by an investigator at your location. If there is nothing beneath Ravenous, flip it over.

side/blbe.name: Regurgitation
side/blbe.text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. If Ravenous (Uncontrolled Hunger) is face up, flip it over. Choose and return up to 3 cards you devoured (beneath Ravenous or set-aside) to their owners' hands. For each card returned in this way, heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

side/blbe.name: Reality Acid
side/blbe.text: Revelation - If Ravenous (Controlled Hunger) is face up, flip it over. You devour a random aspect of reality. Reveal a random chaost token from the chaos bag and consult Reality Acid reference card to determine what you devoured.

side/blbe.name: Reality Acid
side/blbe.text: Subject 5U-21 Devours... (If the chaos token revealed is not listed, or if the listed aspect cannot be devoured, reveal a new chaos token and consult the list again.) - [elder_sign]: ...a non-[[Elite]] enemy or treachery, at your location and worth no victory points. - +1: ...the top card of each investigator's discard pile. - 0: ...the top card of each investigator's deck. - -1: ...1 card at random from your hand. - -2: ...a non-story, non-weakness asset controlled by an investigator at your location. - -3: ...a player card attached to your location, or attached to an encounter card at your location. - -4: ...the top 2 cards of each investigator's deck. - -5: ...-3 cards of your choice from your hand. - -6: ...all events from each investigator's hand. - -7: ...a non-story, non-weakness asset from each investigator's play area. - -8: ...a non-weakness siganture card in any player's deck, hand, discard pile, or play area. - [skull]: ...1 card beneath Ravenous, at random. - [cultist]: ...each card committed to each skill test at your location (after the test ends), until the end of the next investigation phase. - [tablet]: ...each event played by investigators at your location, until the end of the next investigation phase. - [elder_thing]: ...the player card at your location with the most evidence, supplies, ammo, charges, or secrets on it. - [auto_fail]: Reveal 3 more chaos tokens and resolve each of those devour effects.

side/coh_encounter.back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -2. This token has an additional -1 for each Innocent Reveler underneath the act or agenda decks.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail this test, draw the top card of the encounter deck.
[tablet]: -4. Deal 1 damage or 1 horror to the nearest Innocent Reveler in play.
[elder_thing]: -6. If you fail and Cnidathqua is in play, it attacks you.
side/coh_encounter.name: Carnevale of Horrors
side/coh_encounter.text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2. This token has an additional -1 for each Innocent Reveler underneath the agenda deck.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail this test, draw the top card of the encounter deck.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, deal 1 damage or 1 horror to the nearest Innocent Reveler in play.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail and Cnidathqua is in play, it attacks you.

side/coh_encounter.flavor: Last-minute ocean liner tickets from Boston to Italy set you back a fair bit of dough, but after a tense journey, you arrive in Venice. The Carnevale has already begun, and the city is in celebration. Colorful confetti rains from above, covering the streets. Many revelers throng in Piazza San Marco, the square outside of Basilica. The parade is to begin shortly. You find the nearest uniformed Carabinieri and show him a copy of the symbol you'd transcribed from "Zanni's" mask. He pauses to decide your trustworthiness, nods, and escorts you into the basilica to see the Abbess Allegria Di Biase.
side/coh_encounter.name: The Festivities Begin
Baleful Reveler
side/coh_encounter.text: Spawn - The nearest location with no investigators counter-clockwise from the lead investigator. Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - After Baleful Reveler moves from the hunter keyword, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, resolve its hunter keyword again. (Limit once per round.)

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The shadow of the eclipse is unrelenting. Throughout the city, a dull chant overtakes the screaming and the chaos, its language ancient and morbid. Tentacles course through the canals from the south, weaving beneath bridges and trapping entire islands within their grasp.
side/coh_encounter.back_text:
If there are 1 or more Masked Carnevale-Goers in play, the lead investigator chooses 1 and flips it to its other side. If its other side is an Innocent Reveler, place it underneath the agenda deck.
If there is still a Masked Carnevale-Goer in play, flip this agenda back to agenda 2a.
Otherwise, advance to agenda 3a.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: The clamor and celebration of the Carnevale has for the most part drowned out the terrors you've seen in the city... Until now. The sun vanishes behind the moon, and darkness overtakes the sky. There is a solitary cry and the sound of crashing water. Within moments, screams erupt throughout the city. And yet, somehow, you see revelers still celebrating with wide, crazed smiles.
side/coh_encounter.name: The Shadow of the Eclipse

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: Great tentacle-arms, covered with acrid slime, rise from the canals and lash at you and anyone else unfortunate enough to be in the vicinity.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: In player order, Cnidathqua attacks each investigator in play, regardless of their location. Damage and horror from these attacks must be assigned to an Innocent Reveler first, if able. Then, flip this agenda back to agenda 3a.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: In the lagoon, an ancient terror stirs. The creature's tentacles coil around the city, and the water level begins to rise. As if in response, the chanting you hear throughout the city grows louder.
side/coh_encounter.name: Chaos at the Carnevale
side/coh_encounter.text: Forced - After a Writhing Appendage enters play: Place 2 doom on it.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: Many of the revelers are under the sway of a foul spell, and they cannot see the danger emerging around them. You push your way through the crowded streets, gathering what few sane revelers you can find and guiding them toward the relative safety of the Basilica. As the last of them is escorted inside, the ground shakes violently, and a watery shape looms above the island to the south from deep within the lagoon. Their ritual nearly finished, the "revelers" in the streets begin to unmask...
side/coh_encounter.back_text:
Put the set-aside Cnidathqua enemy into play in the center of all of the locations. For the remainder of the scenario, Cnidathqua is considered to be in play but is not at any location.
The lead investigator chooses a Masked Carnevale-Goer in play and flips it to its other side.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: The abbess addresses you privately: "So, you know what is coming?" You nod. "Then you know what must be done. They are using the celebration as a sacrifice for their wretched master. Bring as many innocents as you can here, where I can protect them. But beware - the creature's servants will try to blend into the crowd with their false masks."
side/coh_encounter.name: The Carnevale Conspiracy
side/coh_encounter.text: [action] The investigators spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Look at the other side of a Masked Carnevale-Goer at any location. Objective - If there are a total of 3 Innocent Revelers underneath the act and/or agenda decks, advance.

side/coh_encounter.flavor: The civilians in the Basilica are safe for now, but Venice is doomed if you don't act quickly. The only way to ensure the safety of the sacrifices is to draw the creature in the lagoon away from the city. Sweat beads down your forehead as you realize this decision may be your last. Legs trembling, you head towards the moored boats docked by the canals.
side/coh_encounter.name: Get to the Boats!
side/coh_encounter.text: Forced - After the mythos phase begins: Choose a Masked Carnevale-Goer in play and flip it to its other side. Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Canal-side, advance.

side/coh_encounter.name: Gondola
side/coh_encounter.text: Revelation - Put Gondola into play and move each investigator to it. Then, remove all other locations from the game. Remove from the game each enemy and asset at those locations, as well. [action]: Test [combat] or [agility] (2) to row as hard as you can. If you succeed, place 1 resource from the token bank on this location.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The skin on your hands blisters, rubbed raw by the oar, and your arms ache with pain. The creature movement is slow, its body covered in acrid slime, but its countless tentacles lash at you from the dark waters, coiling around your gondola and attempting to pry the oar out of your hands. With a heart-wrenching snap, the oar splinters into two pieces, the bottom half splashing into the lagoon. You desperately try to propel the gondola forward using any means you can, but it is futile. The beast gains on you, looming over the boat with an impossible feathery shape, its tendrils reaching for you. Above it, the black shape of the moon begins to slide. A thin crescent of sunlight pierces through the mist as the eclipse ends, and the creature's tendrils recoil to surround its body. Slowly it sinks into the lagoon, its body melting as the sun escapes its prison.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: Relief turns to desperation as the creature draws its attention to your gondola. You have only one chance if you are to survive.
side/coh_encounter.name: Row!
side/coh_encounter.text: Forced - When you would draw the top card of the encounter deck: Instead look at the top 5 cards of the encounter deck and put each Writhing Appendage among those cards into play, engaged with you. Discard the rest of those cards. Objective - If there are 4 [per_investigator] resources on Gondola, advance.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: You cannot help but marvel at the Basilica's opulence and towering presence. In the piazza outside, revelers dance and celebrate, oblivious to their peril.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: San Marco Basilica is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: Blessed and warded by the abbess, the Basilica is about as safe a place as you can find in Venice. But it is not safe enough.
side/coh_encounter.name: San Marco Basilica
side/coh_encounter.text:
San Marco Basilica is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
[action]: Place an Innocent Reveler you control underneath the act deck, out of play.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: Canals course through the city's many islands, lined with gondole, traghetti, and other boats. The redolence of the festival clashes with the pungent odor of the water. Here the music of the Carnevale is faded, replaced by the sound of gentle sloshing against the docks and canal walls.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Canal-side is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: The water ripples and swells, causing some boats to sway and even capsize. You made a mental note to stay away from the docks.
side/coh_encounter.name: Canal-side
side/coh_encounter.text:
Canal-side is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
[reaction] After you enter Canal-side: Place 1 clue on Canal-side from the token bank.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The parade of masks follows a circuitous route through the city, through the canal-side walkways and over more bridges than you can count. Streamers and confetti litter the streets where the parade has already passed by.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Streets of Venice is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.name: Streets of Venice
side/coh_encounter.text: Streets of Venice is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. [free]: Move (to the location in the clockwise direction).

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The Ponte di Rialto is the oldest bridge spanning the Grand Canal. It has endured for centuries, but even its stone may crumble should you fail.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Rialto Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.name: Rialto Bridge
side/coh_encounter.text: Rialto Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. Forced - After you leave Rialto Bridge: Lose 1 action.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The parade's path meanders away from the canals and winds through a beautiful garden. Moonlight streams through the leaves, dappling the ancient marble statues.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Venetian Garden is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: The garden's quiet elegance stands in stark contrast to the raucous celebrations throughout the city.
side/coh_encounter.name: Venetian Garden
side/coh_encounter.text:
Venetian Garden is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
[action] [action] Spend 2 resources: Heal 2 horror. (Limit once per game.)

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: With a pang of discomfort, you imagine how disheartening the view would be from inside the enclosed bridge, looking out of its cramped windows.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Bridge of Sighs is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.name: Bridge of Sighs
side/coh_encounter.text: Bridge of Sighs is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. Forced - After you leave Bridge of Sighs: Take 1 horror.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: As the rising tide of the acqua alta floods the square, you trudge through the numbingly cold water. The parade continues across a makeshift wooden bridge that spans the square, too narrow for your comfort.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Flooded Square is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.name: Flooded Square
side/coh_encounter.text:
Flooded Square is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
[action]: Automatically evade a non-[[Elite]] enemy at the location in the counter-clockwise direction. (Group limit once per turn.)

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The long and narrow Ponte dell'Accademia is one of only four bridges that span the Grand Canal. Many pairs of yellow eyes gaze at the bridge from the academy's high windows, seemingly waiting for you to cross...
side/coh_encounter.back_text: Accademia Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.name: Accademia Bridge
side/coh_encounter.text: Accademia Bridge is connected to the location in the clockwise direction. Forced - After you leave Accademia Bridge: Lose 2 resources.

side/coh_encounter.back_flavor: The statue's eyes seem to glow with the light of the moon.
side/coh_encounter.back_text: The Guardian is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
side/coh_encounter.flavor: You're sure it's made of stone. Why does it seem so alive?
side/coh_encounter.name: The Guardian
side/coh_encounter.text:
The Guardian is connected to the location in the clockwise direction.
[reaction] After you enter The Guardian: Draw 1 card.

side/coh_encounter.name: Masked Carnevale-Goer
side/coh_encounter.text: [action] Spend 1 clue: Flip Masked Carnevale-Goer. If its other side is an enemy, it attacks each investigator in its location.

side/coh_encounter.name: Don Lagorio
side/coh_encounter.text:
Hunter.
While resolving the hunter keyword on Don Lagorio, his location is connected to the location in the counter-clockwise direction, as well as the clockwise direction.

side/coh_encounter.name: Elisabetta Magro
side/coh_encounter.text: Aloof. Forced - When you look at Elisabetta Magro using the ability on Act 1a: Flip her to this side. Forced - When the mythos phase ends: Place 1 doom on Elisabetta Magro.

side/coh_encounter.name: Salvatore Neri
side/coh_encounter.text:
Retaliate.
Salvatore Neri's fight value is equal to the attacking investigator's base [combat].
Salvatore Neri's evade value is equal to the evading investigator's base [agility].

side/coh_encounter.name: Savio Corvi
side/coh_encounter.text:
Hunter.
While resolving the hunter keyword on Savio Corvi, his location is connected to the location across from him, as well as in the clockwise direction.

side/coh_encounter.name: Innocent Reveler
side/coh_encounter.text: [action]: Parley. Test [intellect] (2) to convince the reveler to follow you to safety. If you succeed, take control of Innocent Reveler. Forced - When Innocent Reveler would be discarded: Place it underneath the agenda deck, out of play. Each investigator takes 1 horror.

side/coh_encounter.name: Abbess Allegria Di Biase
side/coh_encounter.text: [free]: Exhaust Abbess Allegria Di Biase: Move from her location to a connecting location, or to her location from a location connected to it. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

side/coh_encounter.name: Bauta
side/coh_encounter.text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] in play.
[reaction] After Bauta enters play: Gain 2 resources.
[reaction] When you initiate a non-[combat] test, discard Bauta: Use [combat] for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

side/coh_encounter.name: Medico Della Peste
side/coh_encounter.text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] in play.
[reaction] After Medico Della Peste enters play: You heal 1 damage or 1 horror.
[reaction] When you initiate a non-[willpower] test, discard Medico Della Peste: Use [willpower] for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

side/coh_encounter.name: Pantalone
side/coh_encounter.text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] in play.
[reaction] After Pantalone enters play: Draw 2 cards.
[reaction] When you initiate a non-[intellect] test, discard Pantalone: Use [intellect] for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

side/coh_encounter.name: Gilded Volto
side/coh_encounter.text:
Limit 1 [[Mask]] in play.
[reaction] After Gilded Volto enters play: Treat the next asset you play this turn as if it has fast.
[reaction] When you initiate a non-[agility] test, discard Gilded Volto: Use [agility] for this test, instead of the skill indicated.

side/coh_encounter.name: Cnidathqua
side/coh_encounter.text: You may fight Cnidathqua as if it were at your location (it is not engaged with you). Cnidathqua cannot be evaded. Forced - After you fail a test while attacking Cnidathqua: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Writhing Appendage and spawn it engaged with you. Objective - If Cnidathqua is defeated, (→R2).

side/coh_encounter.name: Poleman
side/coh_encounter.text: Spawn - Canal-side. Prey - Most Innocent Revelers controlled. Hunter.

side/coh_encounter.name: Carnevale Sentinel
side/coh_encounter.text: Spawn - The location across from you. Retaliate. You cannot look at the other side of Masked Carnevale-Goers at Carnevale Sentinel's location using the ability on Act 1a.

side/coh_encounter.name: Writhing Appendage
side/coh_encounter.text: Retaliate. Forced - After Writhing Appendage attacks you: Discard a random card from your hand. Forced - When Writhing Appendage is defeated, if Cnidathqua is in play: Deal 1 damage to Cnidathqua.

side/coh_encounter.name: Mass Hysteria
side/coh_encounter.text: Peril. Revelation - You must either take 2 damage or take each Masked Carnevale-Goer, shuffle them so the investigators do not know which is which, and place 1 in each location, starting with the location clockwise from you (Masked Carnevale-Goer side face-up).

side/coh_encounter.flavor: How exactly did you end up here?
side/coh_encounter.name: Lost in Venice
side/coh_encounter.text: Peril. Revelation - You must either take 2 horror or move to the location across from you.

side/coh_encounter.name: Watchers' Gaze
side/coh_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). Each investigator who controls an Innocent Reveler must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 1 horror, which must be assigned to Innocent Reveler first, if able.

side/coh_encounter.name: Chaos in the Water
side/coh_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (4). Each investigator who controls an Innocent Reveler must also perform this skill test. Each investigator who fails takes 1 damage, which must be assigned to an Innocent Reveler first, if able.

side/coh_encounter.name: Mesmerize
side/coh_encounter.text: Revelation - If there are no Masked Carnevale-Goers at your location, Mesmerize gains surge. If there is a Masked Carnevale-Goer at your location, flip it. If it is an Innocent Reveler, move it to the farthest location clockwise from you with no investigators, then deal it 1 damage and 1 horror.

side/coh_encounter.flavor: When the revelers come out to celebrate, they come out to feed.
side/coh_encounter.name: Abduction
side/coh_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, you must either lose all of your resources or choose and discard an [[Ally]] asset you control.

side/coh_encounter.name: Acrid Miasma
side/coh_encounter.text: Revelation - Attach to the nearest location in the clockwise direction with no Acrid Miasma. Forced - After an investigator enters attached location, he or she tests [willpower] (2). If failed, that investigator must either take 1 damage and 1 horror, or resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.

side/cotr_encounter.back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -3 (-6 instead if you are at a [[Bayou]] location).
[cultist]: -3. If the Rougarou is in your location, reveal another token.
[tablet]: Reveal another token. If you fail, until the end of the round, you cannot move.
[elder_thing]: -4. If the Rougarou is at your location or a connecting location, it attacks you.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Curse of the Rougarou
side/cotr_encounter.text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2 (-4 instead if you are at a [[Bayou]] location).
[cultist]: -2. If the Rougarou is in your location, reveal another token.
[tablet]: Reveal another token. If you fail, until the end of the round, you cannot move.
[elder_thing]: -4. If the Rougarou is at your location, it attacks you.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: A violent storm rolls in as your search continues. Black rainclouds conquer the sky, the air thick with humidity. You recall that all of the recent killings took place late at night, under the cover of dark clouds. A shiver runs down your spine - what if you are next?
side/cotr_encounter.back_text:
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
If The Rougarou is in play, find a non-[[Bayou]] location with the fewest clues on it. Move The Rougarou (one location at a time) until it enters that location.
If The Rougarou is not in play, after advancing to agenda 2a, add 1 doom to that agenda.
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: After arriving in New Orleans the next day, you start your investigation by asking the locals what they knew of the recent killings. As you suspected, most know very little of the incidents. You do manage to find several eyewitnesses who give similar descriptions of the creature: its lithe, muscular form, lanky arms, and wolf-like visage. A promising start - but if there is any truth to the rumors about this "curse", you'll have to talk to Lady Esprit herself.
side/cotr_encounter.name: A Creature of the Bayou

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: A clash of thunder roars through the sky, and you reel in pain from the sudden explosion of noise. Your vision doubles, and bile leaps up your throat. A lone howl returns the call of the sky, echoing throughout the bayou. You wrench yourself off the muddy ground and find your bearings, unable to shake the feeling that you're running out of time.
side/cotr_encounter.back_text:
Shuffle all copies of On the Prowl from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
If The Rougarou is in play, find a non-[[Bayou]] location with the fewest clues on it. Move The Rougarou (one location at a time) until it enters that location.
If The Rougarou is not in play, after advancing to agenda 3a, add 1 doom to that agenda.
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: Around you, the bayou feasts. Flesh rips and jaws snap just beyond the trees, and light droplets of rain ripple upon the surface of the water. You can't tell exactly where the sounds are coming from. Perhaps it's the dreadful ambience of the bayou itself.
side/cotr_encounter.name: The Rougarou Feeds

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: A high-pitched shriek echoes through the bayou, followed by the sinister howls of the accursed Rougarou. The beast has drawn blood again - this you are sure of.
side/cotr_encounter.back_text:
The bearer of the Curse of the Rougarou weakness read the following (out loud):
You feel something dripping from your hand, and are surprised to find your knuckles bloody and torn. Nearby, the bard of a tree is smashed and dripping with blood. The anger of your failure slowly fades as you realize the blood is yours.
(→R1)
If no investigators gained the Curse of the Rougarou: (→R1)
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: Tendrils of slime ooze from the bogs, crawling over tree roots and grasping at you as you pass. The air hangs heavy with a noxious heat. You feel as though you are sinking, sinking deep into the bayou, sinking beneath the heaviness of the black sky and the rank mist...
side/cotr_encounter.name: The Curse Spreads
side/cotr_encounter.text: Forced - At the end of the investigation phase, if The Rougarou is not engaged with an investigator: Add 1 doom to this agenda.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: Finding Lady Esprit's shack is no simple endeavor, but eventually you spot the decrepit shanty through the mist. Lady Esprit greets you as you enter, not at all surprised by your intrusion. She claims that the Rougarou was once a man, cursed by a being known as "Shub-Niggurath" into the form of a great wolf. She believes that she can lift the Rougarou's curse from the bayou, but only if the creature is destroyed.
side/cotr_encounter.back_text:
Put the set-aside Lady Esprit into play at a [[Bayou]] location. Put into play each set aside location. Put the set-aside The Rougarou enemy into play at any non-[[Bayou]] location. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and each encounter card from the Curse of the Rougarou encounter set into the encounter deck. The lead investigator reads the following (out loud):
As you leave Lady Esprit's shack, a terrible sickness courses through you, and you drop to your knees.
The lead investigator puts the set-aside Curse of the Rougarou weakness into play in his or her threat area.
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: According to your contact, Lady Esprit is a Voodoo priestess who lives deep within the bayou. Most tend to stay clear of her lonely shack. After all, the bayou can be a dangerous place, even were it not for the recent rash of savage killings.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Finding Lady Esprit
side/cotr_encounter.text: Objective - Only investigators at a [[Bayou]] location may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: Conversing with the creature is a daunting task. Whenever it is cornered, it bellows and attacks, like a feral beast. If there is still some semblance of humanity left inside the create, it is buried deep beneath the rage and bloodlust of the curse.
side/cotr_encounter.back_text: If each of the following requirements are met, proceed to (→R3). Otherwise, flip this act back to its "a" side. - "We must learn more about the curse." The investigators must have 4 [per_investigator] clues, as a group. - "We must keep it contained." The Rougarou must have a [[Trap]] card attached to it. - "We must protect ourselves." The Rougarou must have at least 1 [per_investigator] damage on it. - "We must calm it down." The investigators must have either "found a binding stone" or "found a strange doll."
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: The Rougarou is somewhere within the vast bayou. You must track it down and destroy it, lest the beast's curse consume you as well.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Hunting the Rougarou
side/cotr_encounter.text: Forced - After The Rougarou leaves a location: Place 1 clue from the token bank on that location. Objective - "We have to destroy the beast!" If The Rougarou is defeated: (→R2) Objective - "Maybe there's another way..." While an investigator is engaged with The Rougarou, he or she may choose to advance. (Limit once per phase.)

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: Black storm clouds loom above you, watching patiently as you trudge through the bayou. Their shapes twist and churn in the night sky, blotting out the stars.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Cursed Shores
side/cotr_encounter.text: [action]: Take 1 damage. You get +2 to your skill value for the next skill test you make this turn. Forced - When you leave Cursed Shores: Choose and discard a skill card from your hand.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: It is late, but the city's nightlife is in full swing. Jazz clubs and speakeasies rule the night. But your interest lies elsewhere...
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: A trail of blood and mangled flesh led you here. You suspect this is no ordinary garden.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Garden District
side/cotr_encounter.text: [action]: Test [agility] (7) to try to break into a nearby greenhouse and take a look around. If you succeed, remember that the investigators have "found a strange doll."

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: It is late, but the city's nightlife is in full swing. Jazz clubs and speakeasies rule the night. But your interest lies elsewhere...
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: People are just now beginning to settle what began as an untamed marsh. Truth is, some evils run too deep to exorcise that easily.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Broadmoor
side/cotr_encounter.text: [action]: Resign. "We can't catch the beast!" You make your way to safety, letting the beast roam free.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: The reeking odor of dead fish overwhelms your senses. You can't help but hold your breath as you wade through the repugnant shallows.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Brackish Waters
side/cotr_encounter.text:
While you are at Brackish Waters, you cannot play assets.
[action] Discard 2 assets from your hand or from play: Test [agility] (3) to wade through the dark waters and retrieve an abandoned fishing net. If you succeed, take control of the set-aside Fishing Net asset.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: Even at this late hour, bells and shouts sound across the piers as dockworkers go about their business.
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: Leaves flutter in the cold wind, breaking the stillness of the park. With an area strangely abandoned, you feel as though you don't belong here.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Audubon Park
side/cotr_encounter.text: Forced - When you evade an enemy at Audubon Park: Discard a random card from your hand.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: Even at this late hour, bells and shouts sound across the piers as dockworkers go about their business.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Faubourg Marigny
side/cotr_encounter.text: While you are at Fauborg Marigny, reduce the cost of each asset you play by 1. [action]: Resign. "We can't catch the beast!" You make your way to safety, letting the beast roam free.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: You warily eye the web of vines and blackened bog waters before you, and your heart sinks. You long for the comforts of home, and yet you press onward.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Forgotten Marsh
side/cotr_encounter.text: Forced - When you leave Forgotten Marsh: Lose 2 resources.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: After hours of navigating through impenetrable fog and overgrowth, your clothes stick to your skin and you swat at what seems like the thousandth mosquito.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Trapper's Cabin
side/cotr_encounter.text:
While you are at Trapper's Cabin, you cannot gain resources.
[action] Spend 5 resources: Test [intellect] (3) to convince an old trapper to sell you his last bear trap. If you succeed, take control of the set-aside Bear Trap asset.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: After hours of navigating through impenetrable fog and overgrowth, your clothes stick to your skin and you swat at what seems like the thousandth mosquito.
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: This region is covered in twisted plants that grow odd-looking berries. They look absolutely delicious...
side/cotr_encounter.name: Twisted Underbrush
side/cotr_encounter.text: [action]: Gain 2 resources and take 1 horror.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor: The stench of death and decay washes over you as you slog through this putrid swamp. It's hard to imagine what could live in these waters, sullied as they are by rot and putrefaction.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Foul Swamp
side/cotr_encounter.text:
While you are at Foul Swamp, you cannot heal horror or cancel horror.
[action] Take up to 3 horror: Test [willpower] (7) to search the boneyard. You get +1 [willpower] for this test for each horror taken as part of this ability's cost. If you succeed, remember that the investigators have "found an ancient binding stone."

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor:
Iä! Iä Shub-Niggurath!
Que tous les démons volent de cette endroit,
The world is your prey, your bloodlust unending...
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: A macabre display greets you as you venture deeper into the bayou, where black magick and occult rituals find their home.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Ritual Grounds
side/cotr_encounter.text: Forced - After you end your turn at Ritual Grounds: Draw 1 card and take 1 horror.

side/cotr_encounter.back_flavor:
Iä! Iä! Shub-Niggurath!
Que tous les démons volent de cette endroit,
The world is your prey, your bloodlust unending...
side/cotr_encounter.flavor: These cairnstones were placed here centuries ago, their purpose unknown.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Overgrown Cairns
side/cotr_encounter.text: [action] Spend 2 resources: Heal 2 horror. (Limit once per game.)

side/cotr_encounter.name: Lady Esprit
side/cotr_encounter.text: [action] Exhaust Lady Esprit and deal her 1 horror: Heal 2 damage or gain 2 resources. Any investigator at Lady Esprit's location may activate this ability.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Bear Trap
side/cotr_encounter.text: [free]: Attach Bear Trap to your location. Forced - After The Rougarou enters attached location: Attach Bear Trap to The Rougarou. Attached enemy gets -1 fight and -1 evade.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Fishing Net
side/cotr_encounter.text:
[free] If The Rougarou is exhausted and at your location: Attach Fishing Net to The Rougarou.
Attached enemy loses retaliate.

side/cotr_encounter.flavor: They were apex predators even before the curse took hold.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Bog Gator
side/cotr_encounter.text: Prey - Lowest [agility]. While Bog Gator is at a [[Bayou]] location, it gets +2 fight and +2 evade.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Swamp Leech
side/cotr_encounter.text: Spawn - Any [[Bayou]] location. Swamp Leech cannot be evaded. Forced - When Swamp Leech enters a non-[[Bayou]] location: Discard it.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Cursed Swamp
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 damage. If you are at a [[Bayou]] location, you cannot commit cards to this skill test.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Spectral Mist
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - Attach to a [[Bayou]] location. Limit 1 per location. Each skill test performed at attached location gets +1 difficulty. [action]: Test [intellect] (2) to disrupt the source of the mist. If you succeed, discard Spectral Mist.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Dragged Under
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). If you fail, add Dragged Under to your threat area. Forced - When you leave your current location: take 2 damage and discard Dragged Under. Forced - At the end of your turn: Test [agility] (3). If you succeed, discard Dragged Under.

side/cotr_encounter.flavor: There are dangers deep within the mire you can only begin to imagine.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Ripples on the Surface
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 horror. If you are at a [[Bayou]] location, you cannot commit cards to this skill test.

side/cotr_encounter.name: The Rougarou
side/cotr_encounter.text: Aloof. Retaliate. As an additional cost for an investigator to engage The Rougarou, the investigators must spend 1 clue, as a group (2 clues instead if there are 3 or 4 investigators). Forced - After The Rougarou takes 1 [per_investigator] damage during a single phase: Find the location that is farthest from all investigator. Move The Rougarou (one location at a time) until it enters that location.

side/cotr_encounter.flavor: Your stomach convulses and you feel the first ghastly pangs of hunger.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Curse of the Rougarou
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - Put Curse of the Rougarou into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you have not dealt any damage this turn: Take 1 horror.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Monstrous Transformation
side/cotr_encounter.text: Fast. Set the base value of your [willpower] and [intellect] to 2. Set the base value of your [combat] and [agility] to 5. [action] Exhaust Monstrous Transformation: Fight. You deal +1 damage for this attack.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Slime-Covered Dhole
side/cotr_encounter.text: Spawn - Any non-[[Bayou]] location. Prey - Lowest remaining health. Hunter. Forced - When Slime-Covered Dhole enters a location: Each investigator at that location takes 1 horror.

side/cotr_encounter.flavor: A great thrashing accompanied by an echoing roar turns your blood to ice.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Marsh Gug
side/cotr_encounter.text: Spawn - Any [[Bayou]] location. Hunter.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Dark Young Host
side/cotr_encounter.text: Spawn - Any [[Bayou]] location. Forced - When 1 or more clues are placed on Dark Young Host's location: Place those clues on Dark Young Host. Forced - When Dark Young Host is defeated: Move all clues on Dark Young Host to its location.

side/cotr_encounter.flavor: A dreadful howl pierces your eardrums. The Rougarou is on the move...
side/cotr_encounter.name: On the Prowl
side/cotr_encounter.text: Surge. Revelation - Find a non-[[Bayou]] location with the fewest clues on it. Move The Rougarou (one location at a time) until it enters that location.

side/cotr_encounter.flavor: Driven by hunger, it cares for naught but its next meal.
side/cotr_encounter.name: Beast of the Bayou
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - The Rougarou makes an immediate attack against each investigator at The Rougarou's location and each connecting location. If no attacks were made by this effect, place 1 doom on the current agenda.

side/cotr_encounter.name: Insatiable Bloodlust
side/cotr_encounter.text: Revelation - Attach to The Rougarou. The Rougarou gets +1 fight, +1 damage, +1 horror, and cannot be evaded. Forced - After The Rougarou takes damage: Discard Insatiable Bloodlust.

side/hotel_encounter.back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Innocent]] enemies in play.
[cultist]: -2. If there is an [[Innocent]] enemy in the victory display, reveal another chaos token.
[tablet]: -5. You may place one of your clues on your location to treat this as a -2 instead.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, take 1 horror for each [[Innocent]] enemy in the victory display.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Murder at the Excelsior Hotel
side/hotel_encounter.text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Guest]] enemies in play.
[cultist]: -1. If there is an [[Innocent]] enemy in the victory display, reveal another chaos token.
[tablet]: -3. You may place one of your clues on your location to treat this as a -1 instead.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail and there is an [[Innocent]] enemy in the victory display, take 1 horror.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: As you retrace your steps to make sense of the situation, there is a pounding on the door to the suite. "This is the police!" a stern voice calls out. "We've gotten reports of a disturbance. Open up!"
side/hotel_encounter.back_text: Put the set-aside Sergeant Monroe into play in the Foyer. Spawn 1 set-aside Arkham Officer enemy at the Second Floor Hall (if there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game, spawn another set-aside Arkham Officer enemy at the Foyer). Then shuffle each other set-aside Arkham Officer enemy into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile. The lead investigator draws the set-aside What Have You Done? weakness. For each of the following circumstances which is true, place 1 clue on Room 225 (from the token bank) and place 1 doom on an Arkham Officer: - The investigators have not "cleaned up the blood." - The investigators have not "hid the body." - The investigators have not "tidied up the room."
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: When you come to, you are standing over the man's body. You recoil immediately at the grisly sight. Multiple stab wounds perforate his chest. Blood spills onto the floor. What in the hell happened here? And why can't you remember a thing?
side/hotel_encounter.name: The Murder
side/hotel_encounter.text: If there is only 1 investigator in the game, this agenda gets +1 doom threshold.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor:
You've spent a lot of time in the hotel, and while you're certain that something is amiss, you haven't been able to get to the bottom of it all. As you wander into the foyer, trying to piece together the information you've gathered, you're greeted by more of Arkham's finest entering from the street. As soon as they spot you, guns are drawn.
"Hold it!" the lead officer commands. "You're under arrest!"
side/hotel_encounter.back_text: The investigators failed to solve the crime and clear their names! (→R3)
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: You're not the only ones interested in the strange events at the Excelsior tonight, and the police are on to you. You're still not sure what happened - or if it could happen again.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Special Investigation
side/hotel_encounter.text: Forced - After an investigator at the same location as a ready [[Police]] enemy discovers 1 or more clues at that location or deals damage to a [[Humanoid]] enemy: Each ready [[Police]] enemy at that location engages that investigator and makes an immediate attack.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: It isn't much, but it's all you've got. Your only real option now is to explore the rest of the hotel and see what you can learn.
side/hotel_encounter.back_text:
Put each of the set-aside locations into play.
Remove the remainder of the Leads deck from the game.
Depending on which [[Lead]] assets are in play, shuffle 6 cards into the encounter deck, as follows, along with the encounter discard pile:
- If Alien Device is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Encephalon Signal into the encounter deck.
- If Manager's Key is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Hotel Security into the encounter deck.
- If Tome of Rituals is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Cultist of the Enclave into the encounter deck.
- If Sinister Solution is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Morbid Awareness into the encounter deck.
- If Time-Worn Locket is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Chilling Presence into the encounter deck.
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: Your head is spinning as you try to make sense of the situation. Empty bottles are scattered around the room. Your hands tingle. The shadows seem to coil and writhe around you. Were you drugged? Or is this something else entirely?
side/hotel_encounter.name: What Happened...?
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action] Spend 1 [per_investigator] clues as a group: Draw the top card of the Leads deck. Objective - If the investigators control two [[Lead]] assets, advance.

side/hotel_encounter.back_text: Read Scenario Interlude: The Truth on page 10 of the Rules Booklet.
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: Thanks to the leads you discovered in the suite, you're fairly sure whoever framed you is still in the hotel. The only real question is where to find this person. Looking at the leads you've found, you feel like the answers are right in front of you...
side/hotel_encounter.name: Following Leads
side/hotel_encounter.text: Objective - Learn more about your leads by placing clues on them (using abilities on some locations). The more clues, the better. At the end of the round, you may choose to advance if each [[Lead]] asset has at least 1 [per_investigator] clues on it. (Hint: If you wish to present this evidence to the police, you may wish to have at least 2 [per_investigator] clues on each [[Lead]] asset, instead.)

side/hotel_encounter.flavor: You feel your sins crawling on your back.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Bloodstained Dagger
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. [action] Exhaust Bloodstained Dagger and take 1 horror: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, draw 1 card.

side/hotel_encounter.name: What Have You Done?
side/hotel_encounter.text: Revelation - Put What Have You Done? into play in your threat area. As an additional cost for you to parley, you must discard a card at random from your hand. [action]: Shuffle What Have You Done? into your deck.

side/hotel_encounter.name: Sergeant Monroe
side/hotel_encounter.text:
Sergeant Monroe may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to any investigator at his location, even if he is uncontrolled.
[reaction] When Sergeant Monroe is dealt any amount of damage or horror, exhaust him: Deal that much damage to a non-[[Innocent]] enemy at his location. Any investigator at Sergeant Monroe's location may trigger this ability.

side/hotel_encounter.name: Arkham Officer
side/hotel_encounter.text: Aloof. Patrol (nearest location with clues). Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Move 1 clue to Arkham Officer from its location, flipping it to its doom side. [action]: Parley. Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, either automatically evade Arkham Officer, or flip one of its doom to its clue side and take control of it.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: The rug on the floor is soaked with blood. Broken glass litters the couch and coffee table in the living room. The window is open, a chill breeze flowing through the long curtains.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Room 225
side/hotel_encounter.text:
[action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, remember that the investigators "cleaned up the blood."
[action]: Test [combat] (3). If you succeed, remember that the investigators "hid the body."
[action]: Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, remember that the investigators "tidied up the room."

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: The balcony affords a high vantage point over the rest of Arkham. Leaning over the rail, your mind reels at the thought of falling from such a height.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Suite Balcony
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action]: Choose a [[Humanoid]] enemy at Suite Balcony and test [combat] or [agility] (4). If you succeed, take 1 direct horror and defeat the chosen enemy (if that enemy is [[Elite]], deal 2 damage to it instead). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: Extravagant carpeting runs along the floor, and meticulously clean walls are perforated by blood-red doors.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Second Floor Hall
side/hotel_encounter.text: [reaction] After you enter this location: You may immediately move to a connecting location. If you do, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed, draw the top card of the encounter deck.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: The foyer is a grand hall of polished tile and sweeping stairs. Guests and staff move through the vast room in an almost dreamlike state. Or is that just your imagination?
side/hotel_encounter.name: Foyer
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action]: Resign. You flee the scene of the crime. Forced - When you attempt to move out of the Foyer while there is at least 1 [[Guest]] enemy here: Test [agility] (X), where X is the number of [[Guest]] enemies here. If you fail, you must spend 1 additional action to move out of the Foyer.

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: The white tablecloths seem almost too clean. As you glance through the menu, the words within are entirely unintelligible. Upon second glance, however, everything seems normal...
side/hotel_encounter.name: Restaurant
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action] Spend 2 resources: You place an order while enduring the withering glares of the entire waitstaff. At the end of your turn, if you are still at the Restaurant, you may take 1 horror to heal 3 damage. (Limit once per game.) [free] If each location in play is revealed and there are no clues on locations in play: Place 1 [per_investigator] clues on Restaurant (from the token bank.)

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: Wind whips across the flat, open roof as clouds roll in overhead.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Hotel Roof
side/hotel_encounter.text:
[action]: Test [agility] (4) or [combat] (4). If you succeed, move to either Room 212, Room 225, or Room 245.
[action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, move any number of clues controlled by investigators at this location to Alien Device (if it is in play).

side/hotel_encounter.back_text:
The door to Room 212 is locked. You cannot enter Room 212 from the Second Floor Hall.
Second Floor Hall gains: "[action]: Test [agility] (4) to attempt to pick the lock. If you succeed, reveal Room 212 and immediately move to it."
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: A mass of inhuman matter sits in a glass tub on the desk, connected to all manner of strange and futuristic lab equipment. The bed nearly looks like it was never slept in. Sitting on the mattress is a case of vials, each filled with green, viscous liquid.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Room 212
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action]: Test [intellect] (3). If you succeed, move any number of clues controlled by investigators at this location to Sinister Solution (if it is in play).

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: A deathly chill emanates from beneath the door to Room 245
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: The room beyond is immaculate, seemingly untouched in quite some time.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Room 245
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action]: Test [intellect] (3). Only the top card of your discard pile may be committed to this skill test (place it on the bottom of your deck after this test resolves). If you succeed, move any number of clues controlled by investigators in Room 245 to Time-Worn Locket (if it is in play).

side/hotel_encounter.back_text:
The door to the Office is locked. You cannot enter the Office unless you control the Manager's Key.
Basement gains: "[action]: Test [agility] (3) to attempt to pick the lock. If you succeed, reveal Office and immediately move to it."
side/hotel_encounter.flavor: The manager of the Excelsior is obviously a busy person - newspaper clippings, strange documents, and keys of all sorts are scattered about.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Office
side/hotel_encounter.text: [action]: Test [intellect] (0). For each point you succeed by, you may move 1 clue controlled by an investigator in the Office to Manager's key (if it is in play).

side/hotel_encounter.back_flavor: The hum of machinery and the dim lighting make your hair stand on end. Exploring the basement will be difficult. Amidst the din, you think you hear footsteps echoing your own, just a few paces behind.
side/hotel_encounter.name: Basement
side/hotel_encounter.text:
[action]: Test [intellect] (1). If you succeed, move a [[Humanoid]] enemy at any location once toward the Basement.
[reaction] After you defeat an enemy in the Basement: Move any number of clues controlled by investigators at the Basement to Tome of Rituals (if it is in play).

side/hotel_encounter.flavor: The concierge regards you with a feverish, maddened expression. "Did you request a wake-up call?"
side/hotel_encounter.name: Mr. Trombly
side/hotel_encounter.text: Spawn - Foyer. Hunter. Forced - After Mr. Trombly enters play: Immediately resolve the hunter and patrol keywords on each other [[Staff]] enemy in play.

side/hotel_encounter.flavor:
"You lost? I don't think you should be here."
